entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lynn Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -33.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lynn Lake Airport 04:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
